movie.title: Joy of Sex
movie.description_intro: Teenager Leslie Hindenberg, mistakenly believing she has just weeks to live, decides she will lose her virginity before she dies. Meanwhile, hormone-crazed Alan Holt pursues some sex for himself, with predictable results.
movie.description_full: Teenager Leslie Hindenberg, mistakenly believing she has just weeks to live, decides she will lose her virginity before she dies. Meanwhile, hormone-crazed Alan Holt pursues some sex for himself, with predictable results.

movies.title: The Longest Week
movies.summary: As he eases into adulthood at the age of forty, Conrad Valmont (Jason Bateman), the over-educated, under-employed heir to the Valmont Hotel fortune, is cut off from his allowance following his parents abrupt divorce and tossed out into the unforgiving streets of the Upper West Side. Luckily, he is taken in by his old friend Dylan (Billy Crudup), and returns the favor by immediately falling for Dylan's girlfriend Beatrice (Olivia Wilde). As Conrad attempts to woo Beatrice while keeping both their relationship and his bank balance secret, Dylan tries to set him up with Jocelyn (Jenny Slate). Ever committed to the charade that he eventually finds difficult to maintain, Conrad quickly realizes his charm can only extend so far into debt. Now deep into an extensional reflection, will it take losing everything to make Conrad realize what he can truly become?

movies.title: Cheech & Chong's the Corsican Brothers
movies.summary: Superfecund twins Louis and Lucien, who can feel pain from each other's injuries, revolt against a tyrannical regent who holds France under his iron fist.
movies.description_full: Superfecund twins Louis and Lucien, who can feel pain from each other's injuries, revolt against a tyrannical regent who holds France under his iron fist.

movies.title: School for Love
movies.summary: At the Conservatory of Vienna the student only have eyes for their beautiful singing teacher, tenor Eric Walter.
movies.description_full: At the Conservatory of Vienna the student only have eyes for their beautiful singing teacher, tenor Eric Walter.

movies.title: The Big Fix
movies.summary: A family on the brink of collapse find themselves trapped in each other's bodies. "Freaky Friday" goes to church, in this heart-felt family comedy.
movies.description_full: A family on the brink of collapse find themselves trapped in each other's bodies. "Freaky Friday" goes to church, in this heart-felt family comedy.
